item.title: General NFS outage
item.description: Update - We’ve had to restart our public SSH server as we try to resolve this issue. Traffic seems to be stabilizing, and we will continue to monitor the situation. (02:30 — Mar 22) Investigating - We’ve noticed slowness on our ssh server ssh.ocf.berkeley.edu, and slow response times for webhosting. We’re investigating. (00:20 — Mar 22)
item.content:
Update - We’ve had to restart our public SSH server as we try to resolve this issue. Traffic seems to be stabilizing, and we will continue to monitor the situation. (02:30 — Mar 22)

Investigating - We’ve noticed slowness on our ssh server ssh.ocf.berkeley.edu, and slow response times for webhosting. We’re investigating. (00:20 — Mar 22)
